titleStmt.author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.

titleStmt.title: Paracelsvs Of the supreme mysteries of nature. Of [brace] the spirits of the planets. Occult philosophy. The magical, sympathetical, and antipathetical cure of wounds and diseases. The mysteries of the twelve signs of the zodiack. / Englished by R. Turner, philomathēs.

Turner, Robert, fl. 1654-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for N. Brook and J. Harison; and are to be sold at their shops at the Angel in Cornhil, and the holy Lamb neer the east-end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: "The Spirits .. Philosophy" bracketed together on title page.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "December: 5. 1655."; the second 6 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
